amendment.description: An amendment numbered 146 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds made available by division A of this Act for Department of Defense, Operation and Maintenance, Defense-wide may be used for official representation purposes, as defined by Department of Defense Instruction 7250.13, dated June 30, 2009.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Forbes amendment (A118) Agreed to by recorded vote: 241 - 184 (Roll no. 116).
